org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters

Interface DatacenterCharacteristics

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Identificable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatacenterCharacteristicsSimple

    public interface DatacenterCharacteristics
extends Identificable
    An interface to be implemented by each class that represents the physical characteristics of a Datacenter.
    Author:
    Manoel Campos da Silva Filho

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_ARCH
      The default architecture of Datacenter Hosts to be used if not one is set.
      static String DEFAULT_OS
      The default Operating System of Datacenter Hosts to be used if not one is set.
      static double DEFAULT_TIMEZONE
      The default Datacenter's Time Zone to be used if not one is set.
      static String DEFAULT_VMM
      The default Virtual Machine Monitor to be used if not one is set.
      static DatacenterCharacteristics NULL
      A property that implements the Null Object Design Pattern for Datacenter objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getArchitecture()
      Gets the architecture.

      Get the cost to use each each Megabit of bandwidth in the Datacenter.

      Gets the current number of failed PMs.

      Gets the total number of FREE or non-busy PEs for all PMs.

      Gets the total number of PMs.

      Gets the Operating System (OS).

      Gets the name of a resource.

      Gets the time zone, a value between [-12 and 13].

      Gets the VMM in use in the Datacenter.

      Checks whether all PMs of the Datacenter are working properly or not.

    • Method Detail

      • getTimeZone

        double getTimeZone()
        Gets the time zone, a value between [-12 and 13].
        Returns:
        the time zone

      • setTimeZone

        DatacenterCharacteristics setTimeZone(double timeZone)
        Sets the time zone. If an invalid value is given, the timezone is set to 0.
        Parameters:
        timeZone - the new time zone value, between [-12 and 13].

      • setVmm

        Returns:
        a Machine object or if not found
        Precondition:
        $none
        Postcondition:
        $none

      • getHostWithFreePe

        Host getHostWithFreePe(int peNumber)
        Gets a Machine with at least a given number of free Pe.
        Parameters:
        peNumber - the pe number
        Returns:
        a Machine object or if not found
        Precondition:

        Postcondition:
        $none

      • getId

        int getId()
        Gets the Datacenter id.
        Specified by:
        getId in interface Identificable
        Returns:
        the id

      • getMips

        int getMips()
        Gets the total MIPS rating, which is the sum of MIPS rating of all Hosts in the Datacenter.
        Returns:
        the sum of MIPS ratings
        Precondition:
        $none
        Postcondition:
        $result >= 0

      • getMipsOfOnePe

        int getMipsOfOnePe(int hostId,
                   int peId)
        Gets Millions Instructions Per Second (MIPS) Rating of a Processing Element (Pe). It is essential to use this method when a Datacenter is made up of heterogenous PEs per PMs.
        Parameters:
        hostId - the machine ID
        peId - the Pe ID
        Returns:
        the MIPS Rating or -1 if no PEs are exists.
        Precondition:
        id >= 0, peID >= 0
        Postcondition:
        $result >= -1

      • getNumberOfBusyPes

        int getNumberOfBusyPes()
        Gets the total number of BUSY PEs for all PMs.
        Returns:
        number of PEs
        Precondition:
        $none
        Postcondition:
        $result >= 0

      • getNumberOfFailedHosts

        long getNumberOfFailedHosts()
        Gets the current number of failed PMs.
        Returns:
        current number of failed PMs the Datacenter has.

      • getNumberOfFreePes

        int getNumberOfFreePes()
        Gets the total number of FREE or non-busy PEs for all PMs.
        Returns:
        number of PEs
        Precondition:
        $none
        Postcondition:
        $result >= 0

      • getNumberOfHosts

        int getNumberOfHosts()
        Gets the total number of PMs.
        Returns:
        total number of machines the Datacenter has.

      • setPeStatus

        boolean setPeStatus(Pe.Status status,
                    int hostId,
                    int peId)
        Sets the particular Pe status on a PM.
        Parameters:
        status - the new Pe status
        hostId - Machine ID
        peId - Pe id
        Returns:
        otherwise (Machine id or Pe id might not be exist)
        Precondition:
        machineID >= 0, peID >= 0
        Postcondition:
        $none
